title: HELP Packet loss problems!

replies.body: What ISP are you with? Exactly how are you connected to the internet?

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=NZEKEAnx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-29T09:07:02.167+0000)
>
> What ISP are you with? Exactly how are you connected to the internet?

Sorry, I haven't logged in on the site in a while so I had no idea anyone replied. All is good now, I don't know what happened but it wasn't on my end. Everything is perf. :) Thanks for your concern.
Could you run the test again and see if you get the same results? It might have been your ISP repairing something.
